item.title: Thyssenkrupp Eyes Naval Unit Spinoff to Tap Europe Defense Boom
item.description: Thyssenkrupp AG is moving to cut loose its warship unit, hoping to ride a surge in European defense spending while stepping back from a business that has long been slow, costly, and hard to scale.
